description:
# Overview

SameBoy is a user friendly, powerful and [open source](https://github.com/LIJI32/SameBoy) Game Boy, Game Boy Color and Super Game Boy emulator for macOS, Windows and Unix-like platforms. SameBoy is extremely [accurate](https://sameboy.github.io/features/#accuracy) and includes a wide range of powerful [debugging features](https://sameboy.github.io/features/#debugging), making it ideal for both casual players and developers. In addition to accuracy and developer capabilities, SameBoy has all the [features](https://sameboy.github.io/features/) one would expect from an emulator – from save states to [scaling filters](https://sameboy.github.io/scaling/).
summary: SameBoy - A Friendly and Powerful Game Boy Emulator
author: Lior Halphon
